get(Map<String, TypeConverter<?, ?>>, Class<ST>, Class<DT>) - Static method in class org.lightsleep.helper.TypeConverter
Finds and returns a TypeConverter to convert sourceType to destinType in typeConverterMap.
If can not find TypeConverter to match with sourceType and destinType, finds a TypeConverter to match with interfaces of sourceType and destinType.
If still can not find, finds a TypeConverter to match with super classes of sourceType and destinType.
If still can not find, returns null
.

matches(String) - Method in class org.lightsleep.helper.SqlColumnInfo
Returns whether name matches the table alias and the property name of this column information.
If it contains '.' in the name, the left side of the '.' is compared with the table alias' and the right side of the '.' is compared with the property name.
Otherwise all of the name is compared with the property name.
